titles.title: Praise The Lord Ye Heavens Adore Him

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Praise the Lord! ye heav'ns, adore Him; newline Praise Him, angels, in the height; newline Sun and moon, rejoice before Him; newline Praise Him, all ye stars of light. newline Praise the Lord! for He hath spoken. newline Worlds His mighty voice obeyed; newline Laws which never shall be broken newline For their guidance He hath made.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Praise the Lord! For He is glorious; newline Never shall His promise fail; newline God hath made His saints victorious; newline Sin and death shall not prevail. newline Praise the God of our salvation! newline Hosts on high, His power proclaim; newline Heaven, and earth and all creation, newline Laud and magnify His name.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Worship, honor, glory, blessing, newline Lord, we offer unto Thee; newline Young and old, Thy praise expressing, newline In glad homage bend the knee; newline All the saints in heaven adore Thee; newline We would bow before Thy throne. newline As Thine angels serve before Thee, newline So on earth Thy will be done.
